textlib
Class TfIdf

java.lang.Object
  textlib.TfIdf

public class TfIdf
extends java.lang.Object

An instance of TfIdf contains TreeMaps for documents and corpus Documents dictionary uses file names as keys, and the document class as values Corpus dictionary uses words as keys and [#articles they appear in, idf] as values To use TfIdf algorithm, user needs to create an instance of it by giving it a folder address. When user calls BuildAllDocuments(), TfIdf values for words in each document is calculated User can call methods such as bestWordList or similarDocuments using the filename to get results. See Document class documentation for more info

Author:
Barkin Aygun
